member.name: M:Prorubim.GridsRenumeration.Grids.Renumerate(IList,IList, string, string)
member.summary: Renumerates grid lines set in associating with grid line names, prefix and postfix
member.param: Names set for associating with input grid lines list
Prefix for adding to new grid names
Postfix for adding to new grid names

member.name: M:Prorubim.GridsRenumeration.Grids.DivideByOrientation(IList)
member.summary: Divides and sorts grid lines set by orientation on horizontal and vertical grid lines. Lines orientation is defined as line direction priority. It`s not straight vector.
